verses.text: \w By|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Babylon, \w There|strong="H8033"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w down|strong="H3427"\w*, \w yea|strong="H1571"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*, \w When|strong="H3427"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.

\w Upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w willows|strong="H6155"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w thereof|strong="H8432"\w* We \w hanged|strong="H8518"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w harps|strong="H3658"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w led|strong="H7617"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w captive|strong="H7617"\w* \w required|strong="H7592"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w songs|strong="H7892"\w*, \w And|strong="H8033"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w wasted|strong="H8437"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \add required of us\add* \w mirth|strong="H8057"\w*, \add saying\add*, \w Sing|strong="H7891"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w songs|strong="H7892"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.

How \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*â€™s \w song|strong="H7892"\w* \w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w foreign|strong="H5236"\w* land?

If I \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, Let \w my|strong="H7911"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* \add her skill\add*.

\w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w cleave|strong="H1692"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w roof|strong="H2441"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w mouth|strong="H2441"\w*, If \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* thee \w not|strong="H3808"\w*; If \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w prefer|strong="H5927"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w Above|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*.

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w against|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Edom \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; \w Who|strong="H3068"\w* said, \w Rase|strong="H6168"\w* \w it|strong="H5704"\w*, \w rase|strong="H6168"\w* \w it|strong="H5704"\w*, \w Even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w foundation|strong="H3247"\w* thereof.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* Babylon, \w that|strong="H1323"\w* art \w to|strong="H1323"\w* be \w destroyed|strong="H7703"\w*, Happy \w shall|strong="H1323"\w* \w he|strong="H1576"\w* be, \w that|strong="H1323"\w* \w rewardeth|strong="H7999"\w* \w thee|strong="H7999"\w* \w As|strong="H1323"\w* thou hast \w served|strong="H1580"\w* us.

Happy shall \w he|strong="H5553"\w* be, \w that|strong="H5768"\w* taketh \w and|strong="H5768"\w* \w dasheth|strong="H5310"\w* thy \w little|strong="H5768"\w* \w ones|strong="H5768"\w* Against \w the|strong="H5310"\w* \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*.
